Title: Toy Story
Story: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
Actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles

Title: The Big Lebowski
Story: The Dude Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
Actors: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore

Title: Pulp Fiction
Story: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits interwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
Actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

Title: Porco Rosso
Story: The adventures of "Porco Rosso", a veteran WW1 pilot in 1930s Italy, who has been cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.
Actors: Shuichiro Moriyama, Tokiko Kato, Sanshi Katsura

Title: Happy Gilmore
Story: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.
Actors: Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Julie Bowen

Title: American Pop
Story: The story of four generations of a Russian Jewish immigrant family of musicians whose careers parallel the history of American popular music in the 20th century.
Actors: Mews Small, Ron Thompson, Jerry Holland

Title: Troy
Story: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.
Actors: Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom

Title: Gladiator
Story: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.
Actors: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Story: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.
Actors: Beau Billingslea, Melissa Fahn, Nicholas Guest
